PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1996-12411996-08-070,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
PrecisAuthority to conclude SUPPLEMENTARY TAX COLLECTION AGREEMENTS with each Province and Territory (except Quebec) which add an effective date for provincial income tax rate changes, permit tax to be levied on the capital of financial institutions and mining reclamation expenditures, allow the Department of National Revenue to refund provincial tax to individuals and to administer the British Columbia Family Bonus Program.
Attachments
